This is followed by Jake Ellenberger's attribute graphic being shown, which happens while the narrator talks about Gaul submitting him in the first round. After this, we see the on-screen text reading "UFC OFFICIAL DECISION," which happens as the narrator hopes the athlete can try again despite his age. Finally, the referee raises the winner's hand with "WINNER BY KNOCKOUT" on-screen, which happens as the narrator notes "oh and one" and signs off with "Peace."
